name: 陳志恆
objective: 本課程將介紹界面活性劑的種類及其化學製程、界面活性劑於界面之吸附現象、微胞形成原理與應用、表面改質技術、發泡劑的應用等。
schedule:
1　　課程說明(introduction)
2　　An Overview of Surfactant Science and Technology 
3　　An Overview of Surfactant Science and Technology
4　　The Organic Chemistry of Surfactants 
5　　The Organic Chemistry of Surfactants
6　　General properties of systems containing fluid interfaces
7　　General properties of systems containing fluid interfaces 
8　　Fluid Surfaces and Interfaces
9　　期中考
10　　Surfactants in Solution: Monolayers and Micelles 
11　　Surfactants in Solution: Monolayers and Micelles
12　　Amphiphilic systems – liquid-liquid interfaces
13　　Amphiphilic systems – liquid-liquid interfaces
14　　Higher-Level Surfactant Aggregate Structures
15　　Higher-Level Surfactant Aggregate Structures
16　　Unified approach to self-assembly
17　　Colloidal self assembly
18　　期末考
scorePolicy:
1.　　平常成績40%
2.　　期中考30%
3.　　期末考30%
materials:
1.     Drew Myers, Surfactant Science and Technology, Wiley.
2.　　Stokes, Fundamentals of Interfacial Engineering, Wiley.
3.　　Yoon Seob Lee, Self assembly and nanotechnology, Wiley.
